title: Laser Beam vs. High-Refractive-Index Pentagonal Prism | Ray Optics | Physics Simulations

media:group.media:title: Laser Beam vs. High-Refractive-Index Pentagonal Prism | Ray Optics | Physics Simulations
media:group.media:description:
A simulation of a laser beam, consisting of many parallel rays of light, passing through a pentagonal prism with a refractive index of 3.

- geometric optics, refraction, reflection
- prism has a refractive index of 3
- 25fps
- programmed in C#, custom physics engine

#Physics #PhysicsSimulations #Refraction
